Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 28th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2011...
Traded from Philadelphia to Arizona on 2/12/2011 (Going to ARI: P D. Norris, 2B J. Panik, 3B M. Dean, SS J. Wilson. Going to PHI: P J. Pineiro, P R. Perez)...
Injured on 8/12/2012 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Arizona to Oakland on 2/12/2013 (Going to ARI: LF J. Gomes. Going to OAK: P O. Cueva, 2B J. Panik)...
Injured on 8/15/2015 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/29/2016 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 6/4/2018 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/31/2018 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Released by Oakland on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 6/16/2020 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 7/22/2020, off Chris Stratton (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2021, off Monte Weaver Jr. (MIN)...
Released by Baltimore on 6/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 6/26/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Released by Houston on 6/26/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 6/26/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $328,000 per year...
